title: peralAm viraivinilE
sahitya:
peralAm viraibinilE murugan aruLai nAm


anupallavi

  siridu nEram avan tirunAmattai dinam karudiyE tudittu karaindu uruginAl


caraNam    paNNina pAvamellAm parandODippOghavum eNNinadarp-phalanai tiNNamAip-peravum
eNNaTra bhaktargaL EmATram urAmalE aNNal avan aruLaiaDaindadaip-pOlE
